avalancheActivity.comment: On Wednesday, small loose avalanches fell in Helgafell and a small slab by Baula.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Significant amount of snow has been added in mountains and the snowpack can be unstable in all aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Significant amount of snow has been added in mountains. Prior to that windslabs were formed in southerly aspects after strong NE and then NW winds, mainly in lows and gullies. Older windslabs may also still exist in easterly aspects. No snow profiles have been done in the area to check the stability of the snowpack but windslabs may be unstable and the boundary between the new snow and older windslabs might be weak. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.

travelAdvisory.comment: Winter conditions and new or recent snow in most parts. Widely there is loose new snow that can easely drift. Widely there are older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions, widely older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg breytileg eða austlæg átt og lítilsháttar snjókoma með köflum. Hlýnar með NA átt og slyddu svo rigningu á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Many avalanches fell in the area at the beginning of the week, such as in Skutulfjörður, Önundarfjörður, Súðavíkurhlíð and Súgandafjörður.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Recent snow in mountains and the snowpack can be unstable in all aspects, though mainly in southern aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Much loose snow has been added during the week. New windslabs are expected to have formed mainly in southern aspects. A snow profile was done in Seljalandsdalur on the 25th of December at 330 m.asl. The profile shows a weak layer at 63 cm depth with faceted crystals, that are rounding, between an older softer layer and a layer of layered ice lenses. On top there are layered windslabs. Compression test gave a sudden planar break under medium stress (CT13, CT12 @63 SP) at the upper layerboundary of the faceted layer. This weakness may be widespread. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.

travelAdvisory.comment: Winter conditions and new or recent snow in most parts. Widely there is loose new snow that can easely drift. Widely there are older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions, widely older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytileg átt og úrkomulaust á laugardag, vaxandi austlæg átt á sunnudag og lítlsháttar snjókoma á köflum. NA átt og hlýnar með rigningu á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Multiple avalanches released around Ólafsfjörður and above Ólafsfjarðarvegur on the 24th and 25th. An avalanche released in Strengsgil the night before 24.12. and ran over the road Fjarðarvegur. Two avalanches ran over Siglufjarðarvegur late 23.12.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Significant amount of snow has been added in mountains and the snowpack can be unstable in all aspects. The newest snow is light and easily transported. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. The likelihood of natural avalanches increases on Monday when it warms up.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of snow has been added since before Christmas. It has drifted in variable winds and unstable wind slabs can exist in most aspects, especially south and west facing. The newest snow is loose and light and drifts easily. Cold temperatures the last few days is expected to have stimulated the growth of weak layers with facets. Warming with rain and sleet at low elevation is forecasted on Monday. Then natural avalanches might release because of the heat change and later wet avalanches.

travelAdvisory.comment: Winter conditions and new or recent snow in most parts. Widely there is loose new snow that can easely drift. Widely there are older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions, widely older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Þurrt, kalt og hægur vindur á laugardag. Á sunnudag bætir í vind úr austri og aðfaranótt mánudags byrjar að élja. Hlýnar á mánudag með rigningu á láglendi en slyddu og svo snjókomu ofar.

avalancheActivity.highlights: A lot of recent snow lies on top of old hardpacked snow, especially on the southern part of the forecast area. On the intersection and within the recent snow can be weaknesses. The likelihood of natural avalanches increases on Monday when it warms up.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Before Christmas, thaw reached mountain tops and when it got cold again, snow got stiff and gained strength. Since then, much snow has been added and transported by winds from most directions. The newest snow is light and loose and easily transported. In mountains, wind slabs may exist in all aspects. Weaknesses should be expected between the recent snow and the underlying hardpacked snow, also within the recent snow. Warming weather with rain and sleet at low elevation is forecasted on New Year´s Eve and New Year´s day. Then, natural avalanches might release because of the heat change and later wet avalanches.

travelAdvisory.comment: Winter conditions and new or recent snow in most parts. Widely there is loose new snow that can easely drift. Widely there are older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. People traveling on steep terrain should be careful and choose conservative routes. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, the snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected as the day goes on.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Winter conditions, widely older windslabs and possible persistent weak layers in multiple aspects. Becoming warmer on Monday with precipitation, snow can get unstable and wet snow problem expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg austanátt og dálítil él á laugardag, kalt. Hvessir seinnipart sunnudags úr NA og fer að snjóa. Hlýnar á gamlárskvöld og nýársnótt með rigningu talsvert upp í fjallshlíðar.
